workflow.name: AI Qwen-Vl-Plus powered car fleet maintenance alert system
workflow.description:
## How It Works

Daily triggers automatically fetch fleet data and simulate key performance metrics for each vehicle. An AI agent analyzes maintenance requirements, detects potential issues, and routes alerts according to urgency levels. Fleet summaries are aggregated, logged into the database for historical tracking, and AI-enhanced insights are parsed to provide actionable information. Slack notifications are then sent to relevant teams, ensuring timely monitoring, informed decisions, and proactive fleet management.

## Setup Steps

1. Configure daily triggers to automatically fetch, process, and update fleet data.
2. Connect Slack, the database, and AI APIs to enable notifications and analytical processing.
3. Set AI parameters and provide API keys for accessing the models and ensuring proper scoring.
4. Configure PostgreSQL to log all fleet data, summaries, and alerts for historical tracking.
5. Define Slack channels to receive real-time alerts, summaries, and actionable insights for the team.

## Prerequisites
Slack workspace, database access, AI account (OpenRouter or compatible), fleet data source, n8n instance

## Use Cases
Fleet monitoring, predictive maintenance, multi-vehicle management, cost optimization, emergency alerts, compliance tracking

## Customization
Adjust AI parameters, alert thresholds, Slack message formatting, integrate alternative data sources, add email notifications, expand logging

## Benefits
Prevent breakdowns, reduce manual monitoring, enable data-driven decisions, centralize alerts, scale across vehicles, AI-powered insights

workflow.name: AI Qwen-Vl-Plus Powered Car Fleet Maintenance Alert System

parameters.text:
=You are an expert vehicle maintenance analyst. Analyze the following vehicle data and provide:
1. Priority assessment (critical/high/medium/low)
2. Detailed diagnosis of issues
3. Recommended immediate actions
4. Cost estimate if applicable
5. Safety risk assessment

Vehicle Data:
- ID: {{ $json.vehicle_id }}
- Make/Model: {{ $json.make }} {{ $json.model }} ({{ $json.year }})
- Driver: {{ $json.driver }}
- Mileage: {{ $json.mileage }}
- Engine Temp: {{ $json.engine_temp }}¬∞C
- Oil Pressure: {{ $json.oil_pressure }} PSI
- Brake Pad Thickness: {{ $json.brake_pad_thickness }}mm
- Tire Pressure: {{ $json.tire_pressure }} PSI
- Battery Voltage: {{ $json.battery_voltage }}V
- Last Service: {{ $json.last_service_date }}
- Miles Since Oil Change: {{ $json.last_oil_change_mileage }}

Issues Detected:
{{ $json.needs_oil_change ? '- Oil change needed
' : '' }}{{ $json.low_brake_pads ? '- Low brake pads
' : '' }}{{ $json.low_tire_pressure ? '- Low tire pressure
' : '' }}{{ $json.battery_weak ? '- Weak battery
' : '' }}{{ $json.engine_overheating ? '- Engine overheating
' : '' }}{{ $json.low_oil_pressure ? '- Low oil pressure
' : '' }}{{ $json.service_overdue ? '- Service overdue
' : '' }}

Provide a comprehensive maintenance report.

=ü§ñ *AI-Enhanced Vehicle Maintenance Alert*

*Vehicle:* {{ $json.vehicle_id }} ({{ $json.make }} {{ $json.model }})
*Driver:* {{ $json.driver }}
*Mileage:* {{ $json.mileage }} miles
*Analysis Time:* {{ $json.ai_analyzed_at }}

---

*{{ $json.severity.toUpperCase() }} PRIORITY*

üìä *Technical Data:*
‚Ä¢ Engine Temp: {{ $json.raw_data.engine_temp }}¬∞C
‚Ä¢ Oil Pressure: {{ $json.raw_data.oil_pressure }} PSI
‚Ä¢ Brake Pads: {{ $json.raw_data.brake_pad_thickness }}mm
‚Ä¢ Tire Pressure: {{ $json.raw_data.tire_pressure }} PSI
‚Ä¢ Battery: {{ $json.raw_data.battery_voltage }}V

ü§ñ *AI Expert Analysis:*
{{ $json.ai_analysis }}

---

{{ $json.severity === 'critical' ? 'üî¥ *IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED*' : $json.severity === 'high' ? 'üü† *HIGH PRIORITY - Act Soon*' : $json.severity === 'medium' ? 'üü° *Schedule Maintenance*' : 'üü¢ *Monitor Situation*' }}

parameters.content:
## How It Works
Daily triggers automatically fetch fleet data and simulate key performance metrics for each vehicle. An AI agent analyzes maintenance requirements, detects potential issues, and routes alerts according to urgency levels. Fleet summaries are aggregated, logged into the database for historical tracking, and AI-enhanced insights are parsed to provide actionable information. Slack notifications are then sent to relevant teams, ensuring timely monitoring, informed decisions, and proactive fleet management.

## Prerequisites
Slack workspace, database access, AI account (OpenRouter or compatible), fleet data source, n8n instance

## Use Cases
Fleet monitoring, predictive maintenance, multi-vehicle management, cost optimization, emergency alerts, compliance tracking

## Customization
Adjust AI parameters, alert thresholds, Slack message formatting, integrate alternative data sources

## Benefits
Prevent breakdowns, reduce manual monitoring, enable data-driven decisions, centralize alerts

## Daily Check Trigger











Launches workflow on a fixed schedule
Why: Ensures fleet data is fresh without manual intervention

## Fetch Live Fleet Data














Retrieves current vehicle metrics from your data source
Why: Real data feeds AI analysis

## Simulate & Calculate Metrics
Generates predicted performance metrics and maintenance indicators
Why: Fills gaps where live sensors may be incomplete

## AI Analyzes Maintenance Urgency
AI evaluates all metrics against learned patterns to classify maintenance needs (critical/routine/preventive)
Why: Spot problems 7-14 days before they become failures

## Route by Urgency Level
Splits alerts into critical (immediate action), routine (scheduled), and preventive (data-driven recommendations)
Why: Prevents alert fatigue by prioritizing what matters

## Compile Fleet Summary
Aggregates individual alerts into a daily executive summary with fleet health score
Why: Gives dashboard view without overwhelming detail; spot trends across the entire fleet

## Log to PostgreSQL
Stores all maintenance events, predictions, and outcomes in your database
Why: Creates historical record for compliance audits, ROI tracking

## AI Generates Insights
Analyzes logged data to identify patterns: "Which vehicles need most maintenance?" 
Why: Transforms raw alerts into strategic intelligence for budget planning

## Setup Steps
1. Configure daily triggers to automatically fetch, process, and update fleet data.
2. Connect Slack, the database, and AI APIs to enable notifications and analytical processing.
3. Set AI parameters and provide API keys for accessing the models and ensuring proper scoring.
4. Configure PostgreSQL to log all fleet data, summaries, and alerts for historical tracking.
5. Define Slack channels to receive real-time alerts, summaries, and actionable insights for the team.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
